Shisui delivers a series of swift strikes to his opponent, then proceeds to toss a volley of [[Fire Release: Phoenix Sage Flower Nail Crimson|fire-infused]] [[kunai]], from an aerial perspective, at the opponent, the flames of which spark a devastating explosion.
